Subskills.name: Blasting Radius
Subskills.description: Increases explosion area of effect radius of landmine.

Subskills.name: Stacked Compound
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by landmine.

Subskills.name: Mine Field
Subskills.description: Throw multiple smaller mines into a target location dealing damage and slowing monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Dead Zone
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Rolling Mine
Subskills.description: Land mines now roll forward exploding shortly after hit.

Subskills.name: Panzer Mine
Subskills.description: Chance to increase the size and explosion area of effect radius of land mine.

Subskills.name: Debilitating Mine
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Incendiary Mine
Subskills.description: Land mine ignites monsters on fire on a large radius dealing damage and inflicting burning.

Subskills.name: Crippling Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Stealth Mine
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to send target into the air dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Napalm
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Homing Landmine
Subskills.description: Land mines now home towards the first detected monster dealing increased damage in a large radius.

Subskills.name: Air Raid
Subskills.description: Land mine now marks monster location on hit for an air raid dropping multiple bombs. Land mine now has a cooldown.
